channel.title: Projects on Ean Jacob Gayban
channel.description: Recent content in Projects on Ean Jacob Gayban

item.title: Hacker News Saved
item.description: I’ve been spending a lot of time on Hacker News lately, and like many other people I’ve taken to building a large backlog of links to several blog posts, articles, and discussions. It feels like a waste for me to clutter my bookmarks with links I end up not reading, especially when many of these links are interesting, insightful, or happen to be relevant to whatever I’m working on at the moment.
